name: mindbodysold.com
body:
#Welcome I'm a creative strategist and this is a repository to showcase what that actually means. --- ##Experience & Expertise Brand and communication development across markets, channels and categories with an early career as a copywriter in creative and digital agencies. Investigating opportunities to contribute at the congested crossroads of brands, technology and people. [View My **Resume**](https://standardresume.co/DanielJones) --- ##Work ###'Stealing from the competition' ####_Find the best in the field and learn from them._ [**Stealing from the competition** (Part 1)](http://mindbodysold.github.io/mindbodysold.com/learning-from-competition_marlboro-upforneuland-analysis%20PART%201%20V2.pdf)

[**Stealing from the competition** (Part 2)](http://mindbodysold.github.io/mindbodysold.com/Learning-from-competition_marlboro-upforneuland-analysis -PART-2 V2.pdf) ###'Intersect' ####_Share the best bits from the work you come across_ [**Intersect:** April 2016](http://mindbodysold.github.io/mindbodysold.com/Intersect_2016-04-01.html)

[**Intersect:** May 2016 'Music Edition'](http://mindbodysold.github.io/mindbodysold.com/Intersect_2016-05-01.html) ###Portfolio [View My **Creative Portfolio**](http://mindbodysold.github.io/portfolio.mindbodysold.com/) --- ##About Me Opinionated, idealistic and absolutely convinced that there is a better way. Excited in technology that improves brand experiences for everyone. Currently, as Senior Strategic Planner at Geometry Global, I lead the agency's strategic development for British American Tobacco's portfolio of cigarette brands in the South Asia Area. [View My **LinkedIn** Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mdjjones) ##Contact [**Email** Me](mailto:m.daniel.j.jones@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
